Published October 16, 2021
Roma Nebo presented a new song
Roma Nebo presented a new song "Oore", which became the main soundtrack to the series "My favorite Strashko"
the newestconcertssongs
Hot! New song "Oore"
171
231

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

The new composition continues the story and theme of the song "Beautiful in Heart", dedicated to the fight against bullying and hate in social networks.

At the same time, the frontwoman of the group, Alexandra Zaritskaya, launched the eponymous challenge on Instagram. Users of the social network under the hashtag #KrasivaSertsem told their stories related to bullying in life and shared ways to solve the problem.

“When we started working on the title track of the series, our team had two compositions that came out amazingly beautiful and conveyed the emotions of the main character.

Until a certain moment, we could not choose that single track, so together with the producers of the series, we decided to leave both. If the first song, "Beautiful in Heart", is about the strength inside each of us, then "Tsiluvati you" is a story about a vulnerable, but at the same time the most powerful feeling - love. Love for people, the world around you and your loved one, ”said Alexandra Zaritskaya.

At the same time, the frontwoman of the group, Alexandra Zaritskaya, launched the eponymous challenge on Instagram. Users of the social network under the hashtag #KrasivaSertsem told their stories related to bullying in life and shared ways to solve the problem.
